title: Did Belusi write this letter to Mayor of Portland Ted Wheeler?
subtitle: A laptop computer that was stolen during the US Capitol riots in January 2021 saved the feed for conspiracy theorists.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In August 2020, the President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, wrote to the Mayor of Portland Ted Wheeler urging him to "Blam Trump" for civil unrest in the city.
